about_the_game:
Unearth the shattered remnants of Zianethra's once-vibrant harmony in this electrifying fast-paced stylish action roguelike metroidvania. As the legendary King Cedric, reawakened as a determined skeleton, you'll plunge headfirst into a world transformed by grief and corruption.

Embrace your unyielding thirst for vengeance as you traverse diverse biomes, each infested by shard touched, minibosses born from the shards of a shattered Void crystal. Engage in hack-and-slash combat with lightning-fast combos that embody your unique fighting style.



Unleash exhilarating moves against foes, mastering the art of hack-and-slash warfare as you dance through battlefields. Experience adrenaline-pumping boss fights that demand every ounce of your strategic prowess.

Venture through the twisted realms to uncover the truth behind the shattering and the role it played in dividing the land. Make heart-wrenching choices, deciding whether to execute or spare the corrupted minibosses, ultimately unlocking a roster of playable characters, each with their own dark tale.

As you clash with powerful foes and epic bosses, ascend in skill and mastery, each victory echoing with the legacy of King Cedric's retribution. With every encounter, you inch closer to reclaiming your throne and restoring Zianethra's equilibrium.



Awaken the echoes of an era past, channel the essence of a kingdom's fall, and rise against the tides of corruption. Will you wield the Void's power to shatter the chains of darkness, or be consumed by the very evil you seek to defeat? Discover your fate in this thrilling saga of redemption, dominance, and the undying pursuit of salvation.

Join the ranks of legends reborn and seize your destiny in a world forever altered by "The Shattering".

short_description: Dive into a fast-paced, stylish action roguelike metroidvania as resurrected King Cedric. Hack and slash through diverse biomes, face corrupted minibosses, and conquer epic foes. Uncover shattered truths and choose your path to redemption in this gripping tale of vengeance and power.
